articles.title: How to Sign Into Apps and Websites With Your Apple ID - PCMag AU
articles.description: By using the Sign in with Apple feature, you can sign into supported apps and websites using your Apple ID and avoid having to create a whole new account.
articles.content: To use Sign in with Apple, download and open an app that supports the feature. A few apps you can try are Adobe Reader, Airbnb, Dropbox, eBay, Groupon, Instacart, Kayak, The New York Times, Squarespa… [+925 chars]
